user.title: Configure Caséta bridge
user.description: Please enter the configuration information to connect to the Caséta bridge; use get_lutron_cert.py to generate the necessary certificate files.

data.keyfile: Filename of keyfile (caseta.key) generated by get_lutron_cert.py
data.certfile: Filename of client certificate file (caseta.crt) generated by get_lutron_cert.py
data.ca_certs: Filename of bridge CA file (caseta-bridge.crt) generated by get_lutron_cert.py

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to Caséta bridge; check your host and certificate configuration.

abort.cannot_connect: Cancelled setup of Caséta bridge due to connection failure.
